verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:41
verses.text: There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars: for one star differeth from another star in glory.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:42
verses.text: So also is the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:43
verses.text: It is sown in dishonour; it is raised in glory: it is sown in weakness; it is raised in power:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:44
verses.text: It is sown a natural body; it is raised a spiritual body. There is a natural body, and there is a spiritual body.
